title: Caregiver in assault video arrested
content:
The former President of MD Anderson and icon of 20th century medicine, Dr LeMaistre has passed away at the age of 92.
Protests have erupted at airports all over the country and also here in Houston at Bush Airport Saturday evening in response to President Trump's ban of refugees.
The principal of John Marshall Middle School was removed from campus on Friday following allegations of misconduct with students.
The Astrodome, which first opened in April 1965, was named a state antiquities landmark Friday by the Texas Historical Commission.
In a KHOU exclusive, we investigate who killed Patrick Carver, an 18-year-old from Houston, and why six years later, his murder still remains unsolved.
Houston Police have arrested a caregiver they say was caught on video hitting the elderly woman she was supposed to be caring for.
In a KHOU exclusive, we investigate who killed Patrick Carver, and why six years later, his murder still remains unsolved.
